snippet: PINDUS--Sarah, age 92, of Hockessin, DE, passed away Saturday, May 28, 2016. Sarah worked side-by-side with her husband of 61 years, the late Oscar Pindus at his store, Tri-Town Pharmacy in Lynbrook, NY. They moved to Hockessin, DE from Merrick, NY in 1984 upon Oscar's retirement. Sarah is survived by daughters, Ellen Jane Kurtz (Robert Kurtz, M.D.) and Nancy Pindus (Henry Hertzfeld); grandchildren, Pamela Kurtz Pardes (James Pardes), Mark Kurtz (Norkie Cosgrove Kurtz), Laura Hertzfeld, and Stephen Hertzfeld, and greatgrandchildren Jake Pardes, Dylan Pardes, Hudson Kurtz, Connor Kurtz, and Ainsley Kurtz. She is also survived by many loving nieces, nephews, grand nieces and nephews, and great-grandnieces and nephews Private graveside services will be in New York. The family suggests contributions to Seasons Hospice, Easterseals, or the AI DuPont Hospital for Children Family Assistance Program. Services handled by Schoenberg Memorial Chapel. 1/3
